title: American Horror Story 10x01 'Cape Fear' REACTION
author: Larissa Zeeuwe
comment: Also just in case you weren’t aware the setting for the show is Provincetown, Massachusetts which is a really like how they are portraying it (just slightly exaggerated. In the off seasons the population is below 3,000 but during peak vacation season it’s over 60,000. The area is known for having a lot of artists, performers, and is a very popular destination for the LGBT+ community. Also there is a urban legend in Provincetown that actually made the news. There was a man like creature that they called the BLACK FLASH. It looked like a tall and gaunt pale man dressed in all black with a long black trench coat or cape who moved soo quickly that it was described to be supernatural. It was ignored by residents and the police because only kids were the ones reporting this humanlike creature but eventually a rather normal and fairly respected local woman had an encounter with the Black Flash which caused the police to actually take the reports seriously which happened for quite awhile but all of a sudden they just stopped and haven’t happened since.

the first two episodes were equal to that of coven they were amazing
cant wait for ep 2 reaction
The intro had me feeling queasy with all of the meat and ripping and tearing. Don’t know if this season was written by a bunch of vegans but I don’t appreciate it. Lol
